titleStmt.title: Catalogue of Tamil Manuscripts (BnF) by Vinson (2 of 2)

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary:
A catalogue of the Tamil manuscripts in the now BnF by Julien Vinson, second part.

The codex contains:

Catalogue (handwritten) by Julien Vinson for Tamoul 133-204 (old shelfmark) = BnF Indien 133-204 (new shelfmark). This draft version has corrections in red ink. The proofreadings have been printed and still exist, uncorrected (Vinson 1868) and corrected (Vinson et al. 1866-).

Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

collation.desc: 2 folios = front <emph rend="bold">guard leaves</emph>. No foliation.
1 folio = back <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. No foliation.
21 folios = <emph rend="bold">Catalogue proper</emph>. Arabic foliation 51-66, 66bis, 67-70. Versos blank.
2 folios = back <emph rend="bold">guard leaves</emph>. No foliation.

additions.desc: Printed title <quote xml:lang="fr">VINSON - CATALOGUE DES MSS. TAMOULS 133-204.</quote> (<locus facs="58">spine</locus>).
BnF shelfmark sticker: <quote>INDIEN 1062</quote> (<locus facs="1">front cover, recto</locus>).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: <quote>CATALOGUES 329 BIS</quote> (<locus facs="2">front cover, verso</locus>).
BnF shelfmark sticker: <quote>INDIEN 1062</quote> (<locus facs="2">front cover, verso</locus>).
BnF shelfmark in black ink: <quote>Indien 1062</quote> (<locus facs="3">f[1]r</locus>).

<quote>fragment du mansucrit du catalogue tamoul, rédigé par M. Vinson. Cette partie a été imprimée, ainsi que les pages 1 à 50, qui n'ont pas été remises. Le 2 Février 1869. h.z. </quote> (<locus facs="7">f[1]r</locus>).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). <title>Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens</title>. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See handwritten addition <ref target="http://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b10329763p/f191">f12v, no. 1061</ref>.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). <title>Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga</title>. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577.

Vinson, Julien (1868). <title>Manuscrits tamouls</title>. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).
